resources.string: \ Scroggle is Boggle, but with an UTTT special twist.\n\ User find words and score points depending the letters choosen. Bonus points for selecting the 9 letter word. \n\

\ The game is divided into two phases.You can only select the letter that are connected left,right,diagonally. In the first phase select 9 words from each grid and click on check word to conform if the word exists.\n\ Timer is set to 1 minute each for both the phases. \n\In the phase 2 select 1 word combining the correct words from phase1 from each grid.Select the words from the bigger left,right or diagonally connected grid. Bonus 20 points for a 9 letter word You will be penalised if a wrong word is selected(-2)
